Html:
Hello,

there is no example, in which way we should to include license notice, when using your great library.
Should it be text file in the same place as binary file, or notice in "About form"?

Which is the right way to be comfortable with the request "The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software." in license?

Tom
You may either include a link to the license or project in your "About form" or copy the MIT license text and include that in your project documentation.
